attributes.action: UK Government should provide military assistance to Palestinian civilians
attributes.additional_details:
The only way to stop the continued, brutal and gross over-proportionate Israeli aggression against innocent Palestinian civilians is for the uk to offer the Palestinian government UK military support, in the tools and machinery so they are able to defend their realm.

The UK government must make its voice heard, and help the people in Gaza, who are being subjected to horrific abuse by the Israeli government.
